name: Coastal Super-Combat
description:
*NOW FREE for a LIMITED TIME!*
the COAST is UNDER ATTACK! MOW DOWN INVADERS and DEFEND the BASE!

► ► ► ► ►

the innocent people of tiny island are under siege.

now they rely on you and your expert marksmanship to drive off enemy forces.

upgrade your weapons, fortify your defenses, and keep the people of tiny island safe!

► ► ► ► ►

GRAB a PIECE and MAKE 'EM DANCE:

M16
AUG552
MP5
M82A1
M4A1
M1917
RPG-7
GAU-17/A
M320
SPIDER MINE

LGM-118A

► ► ► ► ►

sophisticated armory with weapon sales, base upgrades and ammo stocking.

► ► ► ► ►

• 10 standard weapons
• 3 special weapons
• air strikes
• 11 enemy types
• 3 dynamic environments, each w/ dawn, fog, day, and night transitions
• 100 levels
• awesome cartoon art & animations
• non-stop action
• amped-up warfare soundtrack
